definition: Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Congratulations on winning 2009 Taipei Golden Horse for Best Supporting Actress.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜紅姐姐，奪得2009金馬獎最佳女配角。

sentences.english: Have you seen the award-winning actor in the street sets up a stall?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾看到金馬獎影帝在街邊擺地攤？

sentences.english: This year's Gold Horse Award had a really unexpected winner.
sentences.chinese: 今年的金馬獎爆了個大冷門。

sentences.english: Did you ever see golden horse awards for best actor in street put stall in?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾看到金馬獎影帝在街邊擺地攤？

sentences.english: This year's ceremony will be held on Nov. 26.
sentences.chinese: 今年的金馬獎頒獎典禮將在11月26日舉行。

definition: to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Jacky Cheung or Hok Yau Jacky (1961-), Cantopop and film star
